TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISqlExpressionFactory

Docs.summary: A factory for creating instances.
Docs.remarks: The service lifetime is . This means that each instance will use its own instance of this service. The implementation may depend on other services registered with any lifetime. The implementation does not need to be thread-safe.
